page.title: 06MENDIP-THE GOOD LIFE
page.content: Despite it's problems,several people interviewed mentioned pleasant aspects of living on the MENDIP PLATEAU. Commuters are beginning to occupy some farms and cottages.We found one consultant architect who worked from one abandoned farm. Although isolated,many people like the peace and love the countryside. Having a car means they can shop in Cheddar or Wells.They enjoy walking in the woods & over the hills.Much wildlife can be seen including deer,rabbits,foxes,badgers, moles & adders The low cloud,high rainfall, winds & heavy snow add a distintive atmosphere to the area which some people "enjoy".Mendip also has a strong community spirit.
